title: IC's Reach Neglected and Unreached People
description: When we think of the unreached we often think of distant people in small villages, but IC's in cities have a tremendous capacity to reach and develop believers who are from neglected or uncreached people groups.
_id: content:2.articles:IC Series:6. Neglected and Unreached People.md

title: IC's Are Local Churches That Share Resources With Local Churches
description: IC's are an asset to the Church of their nation. Through connections, experience, education, resources and a desire to see God's Kingdom grow, international churches and their people desire to partner in ministry.
_id: content:2.articles:IC Series:8. Resource For Local Churches.md
